title: White House: Paris Attack An Evolution Of Terror Threat
teaser: In a statement on Wednesday, President Obama pledged support for the French authorities after the terrorist attack on the satirical magazine Charlie Hebdo.
contentencoded:
In a statement on Wednesday, President Obama pledged support for the French authorities after the terrorist attack on the satirical magazine Charlie Hebdo. Melissa Block talks to White House counterterrorism advisor Lisa Monaco.

Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
